title: Polarization Techniques for the Body and Arms
first_phrase: This text describes a method for polarization of the arms and body, which involves stroking the arms with gentle touches for 2-5 minutes daily. The author suggests repeating this process for about eight days, and finishing with extra strokes without contact. The polarization of hands is also possible through placing the palms together as in prayer, which increases electromagnetic strength and promotes inner calm. The method for polarization of the body involves crossing the arms and stroking the opposite side of the head, neck, and chest with a light touch. Overall, this text provides practical guidance for enhancing one's well-being through simple techniques.
